comments_data.body:
Suspected cause:
In function `actions::prewrite`, subroutine `check_for_newer_version` invalidates the write_cursor which was reused by `get_old_value`.
Admittedly this is a bug that needs fixing, but we might also consider enable "nortcheck" in release build so that any potential harmless breach of protocol doesn't affect production service.
